DOC.brief_summary: The aim project develop model return work ( RTW ) patient sick list due stress relate mental disorder , take account patient 's specific situation ; include workplace , well adapt Swedish primary care set . In late 2016 , general practitioner rehabilitation coordinator public private primary care center offer one-day training work workability patient stress related mental disorder . Also , participant train specific method include patient 's employer early rehabilitation process The project quasi-experimental longitudinal design . The intervention conduct 15 different primary care center , match comparison group . Return work 500 patient analyzed use registry data , 6 , 12 18 month sick-listing . The hypothesis patient sick-listed primary care center completely partially implement specific method average return earlier work patient sick-listed primary care center implement method . Alongside study intervention effect patient ' RTW time , investigator aim investigate mechanism explain effect individual organizational level ( primary care unit ) circumstance necessary mechanism trigger . To gain deep knowledge mechanism context , investigator conduct interview treatment staff collect registry data primary care unit .
DOC.brief_title: Return Work Among Patients With Stress Related Mental Disorders - An Intervention Swedish Primary Care
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis ICD10 F43 Has employment Good command spoken write Swedish Participants must long term sickleave ( > 60 day ) last three year , regardless causative diagnosis .
